保.definition: to defend; to protect; to keep; to guarantee; to ensure; (old) civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3jia3] system

保不住.definition: cannot maintain (sth); unable to keep; more likely than not; may well

保不定.definition: more likely than not; quite possible; on the cards

保不齊.definition: more likely than not; quite possible; on the cards

保亭.definition: Baoting Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan

保亭縣.definition: Baoting Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan

保亭黎族苗族自治縣.pinyin: Bao3 ting2 Li2 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
保亭黎族苗族自治縣.definition: Baoting Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan

保修.definition: to promise to keep sth in good repair; guarantee; warranty

保健.definition: health protection; health care; to maintain in good health

保全.definition: to save from damage; to preserve; to maintain; to keep in good repair; (Tw) security guard

保八.definition: to maintain an 8% annual growth rate of the GDP (PRC policy)

保利科技有限公司.pinyin: Bao3 li4 Ke1 ji4 You3 xian4 Gong1 si1

保呈.definition: document guaranteeing the words or actions of a third party (old)

保命.definition: to preserve one's life; to ensure one's survival

保固.definition: to undertake to rectify any deficiencies in the quality of a building, product or service; warranty; guarantee

保外就醫.definition: to release for medical treatment (of a prisoner)

保媒.definition: to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)

保存.definition: to conserve; to preserve; to keep; to store; (computing) to save (a file etc)

保安.definition: to ensure public security; to ensure safety (for workers engaged in production); public security; security guard

保安人員.definition: security personnel; member of police force

保定市.definition: Baoding, prefecture-level city in Hebei Province 河北省[He2bei3 Sheng3]

保家衛國.definition: guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense

保密.definition: to keep sth confidential; to maintain secrecy

保山市.definition: Baoshan, prefecture-level city in Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2nan2 Sheng3]

保底.definition: to break even; to guarantee a minimum (salary etc)

保康.definition: Baokang county in Xiangfan 襄樊[Xiang1 fan2], Hubei

保康縣.definition: Baokang county in Xiangfan 襄樊[Xiang1 fan2], Hubei

保德.definition: Baode county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

保德縣.definition: Baode county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

保持.definition: to keep; to maintain; to hold; to preserve

保爾森.definition: Paulson or Powellson (name); Henry (Hank) Paulson (1946-), US banker, US Treasury Secretary 2006-2009

保特瓶.definition: variant of 寶特瓶|宝特瓶[bao3 te4 ping2]

保甲.definition: historical communal administrative and self-defence system created during the Song Dynasty and revived during the Republican Era, in which households are grouped in jia 甲[jia3] and jia are grouped in bao 保[bao3]

保留.definition: to keep; to retain; to have reservations (about sth); to hold back (from saying sth); to put aside for later

保留價.definition: reserve price (in an auction); (economics) reservation price

保監會.definition: China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), abbr. for 中國保險監督管理委員會|中国保险监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

保研.definition: to recommend sb for postgraduate studies; to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam

保祐.definition: to bless and protect; blessing; also written 保佑[bao3 you4]

保稅區.definition: duty-free district; tariff-free zone; bonded area

保管.definition: to hold in safekeeping; to have in one's care; to guarantee; certainly; surely; custodian; curator

保育.definition: to look after (children); childcare; to protect (wildlife, cultural heritage etc); conservation

保苗.definition: to protect young plants, ensuring that enough survive to produce a good crop

保藏.definition: to keep in store; to preserve

保證.definition: guarantee; to guarantee; to ensure; to safeguard; to pledge; CL:個|个[ge4]

保證金.definition: earnest money; cash deposit; bail; margin (in derivative trading)

保護.definition: to protect; to defend; to safeguard; protection; CL:種|种[zhong3]

保護傘.definition: protective umbrella; fig. person affording protection (esp. corrupt)

保釋.definition: to release on bail; to bail

保鑣.definition: variant of 保鏢|保镖[bao3 biao1]

保長.definition: head of a bao 保[bao3] in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system

保障.definition: to ensure; to guarantee; to safeguard

保險.definition: insurance; to insure; safe; secure; be sure; be bound to; CL:份[fen4]

保靖.definition: Baojing County in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1]

保養.definition: to take good care of (or conserve) one's health; to keep in good repair; to maintain; maintenance

保駕.definition: (in former times) to escort the emperor (or other important personage); (nowadays) to escort sb (usually jocular)

保鮮紙.definition: plastic wrap; cling wrap; cling film

保鮮膜.definition: plastic wrap; preservative film; cling film
